amendment.description: Amendment sought to make the current ban on drilling in the eastern Gulf of Mexico permanent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-74 to make permanent the current moratorium on drilling in the eastern gulf of Mexico that expires in 2022.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (FL) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 279 (Roll no. 316).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Brown (FL).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (FL) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 279 (Roll no. 316).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
